aka: The winds of the milky way

cast.name: 米克·米基维尔 Mikk Mikiver

trans_title: The winds of the milky way
introduction: The sequel to the 'the waterfowl people'. the author interprets the kiship,linguistic and cultural relationships of the finno-ugric peoples. finns,vepsians, votes, setos, erzya-mordvinians, mansi, hungarians, sami, nganasans,and estonians appear in the film. the film was shot in 1977 on location innorthern finland, sapmi, vepsia, votia, mordovia, khantia-mansia, hungary,the taymyr peninsula, the setomaa region in estonia and on the estonian islandsof saaremaa and muhu. footage was also shot in 1970 in the nenets okrug.
